Idea and Concept

An easy way to realize indexing in existing or new Java based software projects. This indexing solution reduces the complexity of software indexing to a minimum.

The plugin configuration provides the following opportunities:

  • definition of methods and classes, that should be tracked
  • choose if monitoring data will be saved local or at a central monitoring database
  • clear monitoring data
  • additional meta information about developer and department
    • =======

    Maven Site Indexer plugin

    An easy way to index your maven site and give it a nice ajax search box.

    It's easy as:

    • putting searchbox.html in site/resources
    • putting search.js in site/js
    • mvn site:site index:index
    • mvn site-deploy
    • open up your deployed site and enjoy your nice and free search box ;)
